title: Colina Flora
description: B&B eco-guesthouse set in 40,000 acre Sintra natural park with ocean views. 5 minute drive to beaches, 35 minutes to Lisbon, 15 minutes to Sintra and Cascais. Organic vegetarian meals, historical sites. See website for more info.
streetAddress: qta dos Moinhos Velhos 2705-255 Pe da Serra
